html:
5.19.16  12:13 am   Hello, tonight I would like permission to steal your toaster. I need to make toast do I can have toast because I want toast because it's toasty.

- Sincerely, the ghost of George Washington
5.18.16  11:21 pm   How do you get the ideas for your music and videos?
5.18.16  10:45 pm   What made you do all this in the first place? Is it to not be forgotten? For a sense of living?
5.18.16  10:22 pm   are you gonna make history videos for countries besides japan? that would be cool
5.18.16  8:05 pm   Why do you refer to yourself as 'we' in your 'reality' clips? (Congratulations on releasing it btw, you've fully exposed yourself as being an enigma.)
5.18.16  7:15 pm   Have you ever tried making a poem into a song? As in using the words as lyrics and making a tune

5.18.16  6:07 pm   as an addendum, this NEEDS to come out more. i'm sure there are easier ways to get to the "reality" section of your website with it being a little more reachable or something. i dunno, i feel like non hardcore billwurtz.com visitors will miss out on this, and it's golden. do you agree?
5.18.16  6:06 pm   IS IT OK IF I ASK THIS QUESTION IN ALL CAPS?
5.18.16  5:56 pm   Is Bill Wurtz, who you portray right now, a character/persona? Or is this genuinely just you and you're actually this ingenious and amazing
5.18.16  5:55 pm   what is music

5.18.16  5:47 pm   is the password part of the lesson? what i mean is: is it supposed to tell you something along the lines of "if you don't have the thing (password) yet (or ever) you have to do it anyway"?
5.18.16  5:30 pm   You are a freaking inspiration. Don't ever even for a second think that the reality section was a mistake or that it would be a bad move. Thank you so, so much for this.
5.18.16  5:02 pm   will u ever make more jazz
5.18.16  4:59 pm   why are we alive and why does it matter
5.18.16  4:40 pm   did you actually walk that 8hr walk inland? like forreal? I gotta do that
5.18.16  4:01 pm   What drew you to music as a kid?

5.18.16  3:06 pm   I just watched the whole reality section of your site, and I have to say it's amazing seeing your thought process and progress as time has passed. My question is, do we get access to a different set of videos or content if we know the password? Is it hidden somewhere in the site?
5.18.16  2:00 pm   how can I stop being jealous of you
5.18.16  11:21 am   i give up. how do you get rid of the text cursor?
5.18.16  11:07 am   Have you ever been to Japan? (No, I am not asking whether or not you will be making more "history of" videos.)
5.18.16  7:41 am   do you like ribbons
5.18.16  3:25 am   what is your advice for someone whose musical ideas are not flowing
5.18.16  2:53 am   how do i recycle myself and stop being garbage?
5.18.16  12:25 am   why do you have such an affinity for lowercase letters
5.18.16  12:18 am   do you answer all your questions?

5.18.16  12:12 am   So I just randomly checked your site and stumbled upon reality (and the one in your site!) and I'm about a third of the way through it and holy shit dude it's exactly what I didn't know I needed right now. I realize that's not a question, so here's a question: as I understand it, you make your living as a professional musician. How do you split your time, percentage-wise, between stuff that makes money and the stuff that's on here?
5.17.16  11:43 pm   Do you believe love can strike at any time for anyone or is love a slow build up with someone you have to know in depth for a while?
5.17.16  11:31 pm   Could you please explain glass? How is it made? If I eat it do I become special?
5.17.16  10:54 pm   what should i do on my day off tomorrow?
5.17.16  10:53 pm   How can I get hater blockers that block self hate?
5.17.16  10:01 pm   do you have a process for music writing or does it just flow
5.17.16  9:22 pm   Have you ever decided against releasing a video/song that you thought was too serious?
5.17.16  8:31 pm   Are you going to release more "documentary" videos, like history of Japan?
5.17.16  7:27 pm   What is weird?
5.17.16  6:30 pm   what do you think of the time and it's 24 zones
5.17.16  5:40 pm   have you ever been arrested
5.17.16  5:30 pm   would you ever answer a question with typos?
5.17.16  5:30 pm   What do I do if I'm nervous about exams
5.17.16  5:09 pm   just wanted to say I like your new ueqstions page but I think the color scheme makes it hard to read.
5.17.16  4:38 pm   Do you have and use a sketchbook?

5.17.16  4:21 pm   how far in advance do you plan your creative work? do you only know the current and next projects you're doing, or does the timeline extend further? i imagine it might be tough trying to sort out which idea is most important to do next.
5.17.16  3:25 pm   Have you ever decided against releasing a video/song that you thought was too silly?
5.17.16  3:09 pm   how many hours in a day do you spend watching cute animal videos? im worried you aren't watching enough friendo
5.17.16  1:00 pm   A follow up question to the one about being dead, what is it like being alive?
5.17.16  10:52 am   are questions real
5.17.16  5:30 am   when will you upload more videos on youtube? they are very fantastic and good looking

5.17.16  1:35 am   Just wanted to say I completely agree with your opinions on the optimum viewing experience being downloading and watching on hard drive. It worries me that that method of consuming content is going by the wayside. I worry about the consequences of handing to the corporate cloud control of our culture consumption.
5.17.16  12:57 am   any advice for anxious people?

5.17.16  12:24 am   hey not to like tell you how to do your website, cause it's yours and people bother you about that all the time, but i just thought you'd like to know that if you embedded your videos from youtube instead of uploading them to your site they'd load faster. Then again, you'd probably have to make an individual page for each one, which would be time consuming. But then i guess you could just link directly to youtube. idk where i was going with this
5.17.16  1:08 am   are you pro-life?
